__e: I found a body last year in the forest, no blood left in her.
Three days later, the found dead, they bled.
Then I wrapped his head in a towel and stabbed him in the heart so he would bleed out, put him in my bathtub and watched him drain.
Three days later, the found dead, they bled.
When he left, it felt like life would have departed from us.
Then I wrapped his head in a towel and stabbed him in the heart so he would bleed out, put him in my bathtub and watched him drain.
Would you help your children most by communicating, or breaking up but leaving a clean house behind?
Stockpiles are rapidly diminishing... and when they are gone, we must die.
I would also be the best of husbands, if she agrees to marry me, that is...
